word_mean: 碱：可与脂肪酸形成可溶性皂，使红色石蕊试纸变蓝，并可形成可溶性碳酸盐的物质
主要是铯、锂、钾、铷及钠的氢氧化物，也包括这些金属和氨的碳酸盐

sentence.Network_en: The valence atom of an alkali - metal atom has two states.
sentence.Network_cn: 碱金属原子的价原子具有两种能态.

sentence.Network_en: Such detergents do not yellow the wool as alkali tends to do.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种洗涤剂不会象碱那样使羊毛发黄.

sentence.Network_en: All the alkali metals have a single s - electron outside a closed shell.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有的碱金属都在闭合壳层之外有一单个S电子.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English  (denoting a saline substance derived from the ashes of various plants, including glasswort): from medieval Latin, from Arabic al-k̦alī 'calcined ashes (of the glasswort etc.'), from k̦alā 'fry, roast'

entry.def: An alkali is a substance with a pH value of more than 7. Alkalis form chemical salts when they are combined with acids.

means.word_mean: 1. any of various water-soluble compounds capable of turning litmus blue and reacting with an acid to form a salt and water;

sentences.sentence: "bases include oxides and hydroxides of metals and ammonia"

means.word_mean: 2. a mixture of soluble salts found in arid soils and some bodies of water; detrimental to agriculture
